actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1992 to authorize the Secretary of the Army to reimburse non-Federal interests for managing recreation facilities and natural resources at water resource development projects, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1992 to authorize the Secretary of the Army to pay for the non-Federal share of work carried out under the challenge cost-sharing program for the management of recreation facilities and natural resources at water resource development projects by a non-Federal interest if the Secretary has entered into an executed agreement with the non-Federal interest that provides for reimbursement.

titles.title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1992 to authorize the Secretary of the Army to reimburse non-Federal interests for managing recreation facilities and natural resources at water resource development projects, and for other purposes.
